description: Convert JSON data from file, path, or string to Data objects.

json_file.info: Upload a JSON file to convert to Data objects.

json_path.info: Path to the JSON file to load.

json_string.info: JSON data as a string to convert to Data objects.

text_key.info: The key to use for the text field in the Data objects.

errors.exactly_one_input: Please provide exactly one input: either a JSON file, JSON path, or JSON string.
errors.must_be_json: The file must have a .json extension.
errors.empty_json: The JSON file is empty or contains no valid data.
errors.generic_error: An error occurred while processing the JSON: {error}
